system.requirements: Origin Path: Lure of the Void
system.descriptionText:
1. Blessed Scars: +10 to Intimidate Tests, -10 to Charm Tests. Gain one Poor Craftsmanship Bionic Limb or Implant (Spend 200xp to upgrade to Common, or 300xp for Good).
2. Unnerving Clarity: +5 Willpower, -5 Fellowship or 1d10 Insanity.
3. Favoured of the Faithful: +5 Fellowship, -5 Toughness. Gain Peer (Ecclesiarchy).
